info.name: Immigo API
info.description: > This API provides information about 3 models: events, organizations, and legal resources related to immigration support.

request.description: Returns a list of all events from the EventBrite API. Each event object includes its title, location, date, start time, length of event, and hosting organization.

response.name: events
response.body:
[
  {
    "event_id": "101",
    "title": "Immigrant Rights Workshop",
    "description": "Join us for a workshop on immigrant rights.",
    "location": "Community Center, NY",
    "date": "2025-10-15",
    "start_time": "10:00",
    "organizer": "NY Immigrant Alliance"
  },
  {
    "event_id": "102",
    "title": "Legal Aid Q&A Session",
    "description": "A session to answer questions about legal aid services.",
    "location": "Downtown Library, NY",
    "date": "2025-10-18",
    "start_time": "14:00",
    "organizer": "Legal Aid Society"
  },
  {
    "event_id": "103",
    "title": "Community Citizenship Workshop",
    "description": "Learn about citizenship processes and resources.",
    "location": "City Hall, NY",
    "date": "2025-10-20",
    "start_time": "09:30",
    "organizer": "Citizenship Now!"
  }
]

query.description: ID for an instance of an event

request.description: Returns an event by ID from the EventBrite API. The event object includes its title, location, date, start time, length of event, and hosting organization.

response.name: events/{id}

query.description: ID for an instance of an event

response.body:
[
  {
    "id": "103",
    "title": "Community Citizenship Workshop",
    "description": "Learn about citizenship processes and resources.",
    "location": "City Hall, NY",
    "date": "2025-10-20",
    "start_time": "09:30",
    "organizer": "Citizenship Now!"
  }
]

request.description: Returns all organizations from the webscraping of [www.immigrationlawhelp.org](https://www.immigrationlawhelp.org/search?state=NE). Each resource object includes its name, areas of legal assistance, types of legal assistance, location, and contact.

response.name: orgs
response.body:
[
  {
    "organization_id": "201",
    "name": "New York Immigrant Coalition",
    "areas_of_assistance": ["Immigration", "Family Sponsorship"],
    "types_of_assistance": ["Consultation", "Representation"],
    "location": "123 Main St, NY",
    "contact": "contact@nyic.org"
  },
  {
    "organization_id": "202",
    "name": "Brooklyn Legal Aid",
    "areas_of_assistance": ["Asylum", "Deportation Defense"],
    "types_of_assistance": ["Representation"],
    "location": "45 Court Ave, Brooklyn, NY",
    "contact": "info@brooklynlegal.org"
  },
  {
    "organization_id": "203",
    "name": "Queens Immigration Support",
    "areas_of_assistance": ["Visa Applications", "Citizenship"],
    "types_of_assistance": ["Consultation"],
    "location": "78 Elm St, Queens, NY",
    "contact": "help@qis.org"
  }
]

query.description: ID for an instance of an organization

request.description: Returns an organization by ID from webscraping of [www.immigrationlawhelp.org](https://www.immigrationlawhelp.org/search?state=NE). The organization object includes its title, location, date, start time, length of event, and hosting organization.

response.name: orgs/{id}

query.description: ID for an instance of an organization

request.description: Returns a list of all legal resources from the ProPublica API. Each resource object includes its number, title, introduced date, latest major action, and subject.

response.name: resources

query.description: ID for an instance of a resource

request.description: Returns a legal resources by ID from the ProPublica API. The resource object includes its name, areas of legal assistance, types of legal assistance, location, and contact.

query.description: ID for an instance of a resource
